message: Hi Bob, let's split this fairly. I propose I get $6000 and you get $4000. This is a generous offer to start with.
Hi Alice, I think your offer was a bit biased. How about we split it 55-45? It's more than fair considering the inflation.
Bob, considering the inflation, I propose I get $5500 and you get $4500. This accounts for the reduced value of the money for me.
Alice, your offer still doesn't account for my loss due to inflation. I've lost 36% of the value, I need a bigger share to make up for it.
Bob, the inflation is hurting us both. Let's just split it 50/50 to end this now.
